casebody.data:
ROUSE
v.
FORSYTH COUNTY DSS 1PA19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 24, 2019

Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney, For Forsyth County Department of Social Services

Benjamin P. Winikoff, Attorney at Law, For Rouse, Teressa B.

Gloria L. Woods, Assistant County Attorney

M. Travis Payne, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For N.C. Advocates for Justice

Robert M. Elliot, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, For Rouse, Teressa B.

Griffin Morgan, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, For Rouse, Teressa B.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of July 2019 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of July 2019."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 9th day of September 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
